content: hello friends today topic is crocheting granny square holy book cover pattern so simple and easy to make for lager size and smaller using 4 ply wool with 4mm g or 3 5mm e hook using different colors in the holy book cover pattern but don t worry you can use any of one or more colors to the simple and easy granny pattern we worked and share free pattern of the pattern for holy book cover with the same video tutorial for more help and easy to understand the pattern
